structural_unit_name.en: School of Economics and Business Administration

description.en: Writing and defending the research paper.

objectives.en: Acquisition of skills and initial experience for scientific research and the correct formalisation of the results of research.
objectives.et:
Omandada oskused ja esimesed kogemused teaduslikuks uurimistööks ning
uurimistöö tulemuste korrektseks vormistamiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: Students who have prepared research papers:
- know how to find specialist literature and empirical material about the researched problem;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab leida uuritava probleemi kohta erialast teaduskirjandust ja empiirilist materjali;

learning_outcomes.en: - have gained experience in studying scientific literature and empirical material in order to solve the problem under review;
learning_outcomes.et: - on saanud kogemusi teaduskirjanduse ja empiirilise materjali läbitöötamisel vaatlusaluse probleemi lahendamiseks;

learning_outcomes.en: - are able to express themselves properly in writing;
- know specialist scientific language and terminology;
learning_outcomes.et: - tunneb erialast eesti teaduskeelt ja terminoloogiat ;

learning_outcomes.en: - are able to prepare a research paper correctly (according to the guidelines); and
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab kirjalikku üliõpilastööd korrektselt (juhendi nõudeid järgivalt) vormistada;

learning_outcomes.en: - are able to plan their work in consideration of deadlines.
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab oma tööd tähtaegu järgivalt planeerida.

independent_work.et: The deadlines, guidelines and other relevant information for writing a research paper are given in Moodle.

grade_preconditions.et: Acceptance of research paper by a supervisor, submission according to required deadlines (09.01.2025) and procedure.

grade_evaluation.et: Research paper is assessed as passed or failed based on the criteria brought out above by supervisor.

name.en: Chair of Public Economics and Policy
